title: Fizz Is Impossible To Punish, Especially With How Weak Turrets Are
body:
At this point it is literally impossible to mess up with {{champion:105}}

The 1st one he just walked into turret and kills Trundle and E's out, pretty typical for a Fizz.

The 2nd one is just one big fuck you. He's not full health and Q's into a turret, gets ulted under turret by {{champion:113}} and then gets hit by every one of her abilites, after the stun from Sej's ult wears off he doesn't use E to escape, he uses E to kill my adc under turret and then Q's out. Let me reiterate that. He dives a turret at 3/4 hp and gets ulted by Sej, and survives.

The 3rd one is infuriating. Fizz is chasing trundle and tries using his E to kill him, Trundle flashes at the very last second into an ally turret, Fizz continues to chase him by just walking into the turret, and then Trundle blocks Fizz's path with Ice Pillar. Fizz missed his E and got trapped in turret by Trundle, so what does he do. He just uses E again. Forget punishing him, its not even possible to outplay him when he fucks up.

Fizz can not be punished even when making the most retarded of plays imaginable. He can literally hard core fuck up and get stunned under a turret and not die.

The worst part about this is that a few months ago Fizz was ban worthy, but now I wouldn't dare waste my ban on Fizz, now there are about 20 champions even more unbalanced than he is, and banning them takes priority over banning Fizz.

TL;DR If you need someone to tank a turret just get glass cannon Fizz to do it, his armor is made out of my salt.

**EDIT**
To everyone saying I messed up my combo in the 2nd one, I didn't. Sej's ult cc duration increases with ranks 1.25/1.5/1.75, It was a rank 1 Sej ult so it only stunned him for 1.25 seconds and you can see from watching the video that 1 second passes between my ult and using Q on him. His E is instant, he invulnerable from the moment he presses it, if I had waited .25 seconds until the ult stun wore off my Q would have went through him.

To everyone saying my post is invalid because Fizz was extremely fed, since when do AP items help you tank turrets?

To everyone saying Trundle should have sidestepped, how do you sidestep a targeted dash?

Here are Fizz's mistakes or what should be mistakes for those who asked.
1 Q'ing into turret aggro.
2 Not using E to escape turret. You can say it was a good play by Fizz using his Q to get out after he used E, but I argue that his E should not break the turret targeting if he didn't exit turret range.
3 Missing his E on Trundle, he got outplayed by Trundle.
4 Walking through turret aggro and getting trapped in turret by Trundle, he got outplayed by Trundle.
If you watch the video and count the seconds he used E literally 4 seconds after Trundle flashed to dodge it, even with max cdr the cooldown should never be so low on an incredibly powerful ability.

I remember one game I played Karma mid against Fizz. I bullied the Fizz so hard in lane, he had 10 CS within 10 minutes, was two levels under mine, and even disconnected for a minute of the game. I built magic resist and I did everything possible to nullify him. Despite this he was still able to 100-0 me as soon as he felt like it, but we couldn't really do anything to stop him. He only went 4-3 but to see such a bad player in general be able to do exceptional with the champion is disgusting.

Fizz really needs a rework, he's toxic and breaks the rules of the game. You can't punish him but he can punish you very harshly. I think it would be best for Fizz to simply be gutted until Riot finds the time to give him a proper rework.

Karma's really not a great example.  Properly countering Fizz means you need some hard CC (preferably point and click) and to play smart enough to use it _after_ he hops off the pole.  I know a couple people who play Swain and/or Singed who can shut down even a skilled Fizz with almost no effort.  Ryze is also decent against him (Ryze's root has no visible projectile, and is instantaneous point and click, so there's no indication it's coming for Fizz to know to dodge).  So are Nautilus (no kill pressure, but he can make Fizz's life absolute hell), Talon (once Talon baits the jump, Fizz is almost certainly taking more damage than he can deal), Fiora (with good positioning, you can Riposte the impact from his jump, and have an easy guaranteed strike on a Vital), and if you're _really_ good as her, Kalista (she can still Rend people who are untargetable).
